import React, {useState} from 'react'; import {Listbox, Transition} from '@headlessui/react'; const people = [ 'Wade Cooper', 'Arlene Mccoy', 'Devon Webb', 'Tom Cook', 'Tanya Fox', 'Hellen Schmidt', 'Caroline Schultz', 'Mason Heaney', 'Claudie Smitham', 'Emil Schaefer' ]; const ListBox = () => { const [selectedPerson, setSelectedPerson] = useState(people[0]); return (
{({open}) => ( <> Assigned to
{selectedPerson} {people.map(person => ( {({selected, active}) => (
{person} {selected && ( )}
)} ))}
)}
); }; export default ListBox;
